Posts.Content: Mar 21, 2010 09:37PM olivia218 wrote: Saw - I am so sorry for your recent dx. This is a good place to be to ask questions, be emotional, angry at those who say dumb things.  At first I was told lumpectomy and then two weeks later it was multiquadrant and Mastectomy. I got lucky the dx made the decision - then the microinvasions were IDC and more than originally thought.   Prayers and hugs Olivia
